title: How to Make an Oreo Pudding Cake

steps.headline: Break apart and mash the Oreos in a bowl.
steps.description: Spread the crumbled Oreos on a 10 x 13 pan, but save some on the side.

steps.headline: Make the pudding as the directions follow on the box.
Pour the pudding over the Oreos.
Take the remaining crumbled Oreos and spread it on top of the pudding
Place the pan in the refrigerator for about 30 to 45 minutes.

text: Break apart and mash the Oreos in a bowl. Spread the crumbled Oreos on a 10 x 13 pan, but save some on the side. Make the pudding as the directions follow on the box. Set the pudding aside. Pour the pudding over the Oreos.  Take the remaining crumbled Oreos and spread it on top of the pudding  Place the pan in the refrigerator for about 30 to 45 minutes.  Serve and enjoy.
